## Advent Of Sudoku

[Solving Url with PenPa+](https://gmpuzzles.com/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&a=RZI7agQxEETvMnEHUv8VGn9COzFOlr3/NXZUJTAsFDSvXzXaeTye8v+75hjyfsmdebLkF9nyhlzyvXMO+UJO+USqfCBNfpAuf8jF1MPp4fRwGvRqskeLXtOThzPnniV5K3qteact+n3gPm3olFPj0CZct3qv3ObdcIu3yAJ+J+JEnIg7Oj1AepIsqL2h9oW+IBmURWIhSAbJIJkDRTnRkOxLPnISKf4VxZcrxXrxpOLVFbD0ANKUNWXtsPRBEutdaOjGgcswXJQtkithWUWEJ6190v5Gni8=)
(you can also click on the image). If you solve it correctly using capital letters (in default color blue, but also in green or red), a message congratulating you will appear.

**Theme**: Advent of Code 2025 (the first with 12 days of puzzles, and 12=10+1+1)

**Author**: pietroppeter, 1st puzzle.

**Published**: Sun, Nov 30th, 2025

**Rules**: Standard Sudoku rules where instead of digits from 1 to 9 you have to use the 9 letters "ADVENTOFC"; this is also known as a Wordoku.
This Sudoku has additional clues known as “Seek and Spell/Kanaore” clues.
It must be possible to read each of the words listed below the grid by starting at the indicated letter,
moving one cell in the direction indicated by the arrow,
and then continuing to move one cell at a time up, down, left, or right to complete the word.
No cell may be used more than once in a single word’s path, but the same cell can appear in the paths of different words.
Words already in the grid can be part of a path.

**Note**: Inspiration to create such a puzzle came from https://adventofcode.com/ (where you can find puzzles to solve with code)
and https://www.gmpuzzles.com/blog/
(where you can find other puzzles with this format, like [this one](https://www.gmpuzzles.com/blog/2013/04/from-the-foxgers-den-13-sudoku-seek-and-spell/) with a Doctor Who theme).
